page.title: 11 TOWARDS BETTER FARMING
page.content: Auchincruive estate was given to the {West of Scotland Agricultural College, originally based in Glasgow,in 1927. Since the Glasgow College closed in 1974,the estate of Auchincruive,which covers an area of{272 hectares,}has become world famous as a centre for education in various aspects of {agriculture,food technology,poultry {husbandry,agricultural engineering {and horticulture. Students come from all over the world to study at this college and are able to take courses,lasting from one to three years,depending on the type of diploma they hope to receive.This year the students number 540 and are spread throughout the 23 departments of the college.Next year's student intake will include 300 young people from Turkey,who will join with all of those from our own and other countries.
